subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Testosterone
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis’s two-year suspension for testing positive for synthetic testosterone at the Tour ends next Friday, andhe plans to race at next month’s Tour of California.
snippet: Floyd Landis’s two-year suspension for testing positive for synthetic testosterone at the Tour ends next Friday, andhe plans to race at next month’s Tour of California.
